TopicTitle: SpaceX launch facility to be build in Texas, now official

Articles.Content:
[h=2]Gov. Perry Announces State Incentives Bringing SpaceX Commercial Launch Facility, 300 Jobs to the Brownsville Area[/h]

http://governor.state.tx.us/news/press-release/20001/

[h=2]Gov. Perry Announces State Incentives Bringing SpaceX Commercial Launch Facility, 300 Jobs to the Brownsville Area[/h]

http://governor.state.tx.us/news/press-release/20001/

And Perry finally does something correctly in his career.
hey, i live in texas! not that that's significant because it would still take 7 hours to drive there. texas is ***ing gigantic. i hate it. its hot here.
